artefact.description: Find your nearest fire and rescue service to get a free fire safety check for your home, including how to reduce fire risks and making a fire escape plan
artefact.introduction: Find your nearest Fire and Rescue Service to get a free fire safety check for your home, including how to reduce fire risks and making a fire escape plan.

artefact.title: Safety and the environment in your community

details.description: Includes waste, rubbish and recycling, noise pollution and local emergencies
Your legal obligations and rights when renting, buying or owning a home, plus information about Council Tax, what to do if you're homeless and where to get help if you have a housing dispute.

artefact.title: Contact your council about crime prevention and community safety

details.description: Check out schemes for crime prevention and community safety with your council
If you find a flooded road or street, report it to your local council
